e="preserve">Barbara Shelley (born Barbara T. Kowin; 13 February 1932 – 4 January 2021) was an English actress. Shelley was born in London. Her career lasted from 1953 to 1992. She was best known for her roles in ', "Village of the Damned" and "Murder at Site 3".
Shelley died of problems caused by COVID-19 on 4 January 2021 in London at the age of 88.
